Class Player

    • creatures.Player

    Creatures

    public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
implements Creatures
    The class that handles everything about the player.

        public boolean isAlive()
        Description copied from interface: Creatures
        Checks if current health points is higher than zero. Sets the alive boolean to true or false depending on currentHp.

        public int giveDmg()
        Description copied from interface: Creatures
        Damage given from the creature.
        Specified by:
        giveDmg in interface Creatures
        Returns:
        random generated weapon damage plus strength, and amulet modifier for players.

      • takeDmg

        public void takeDmg(int dmg)
        Description copied from interface: Creatures
        Damage taken from enemy creature. Reduces creature currentHp by (dmg - toughness), and - Amulet modifier for players.
        Specified by:
        takeDmg in interface Creatures

      • drinkPotion

        public void drinkPotion()
        Cunsumes one of the players health potions, healing player for one fifth of total health points. If the healing should exceed maximun heal points, current health points will be set to maximum health poinsts.

      • lvl

        public void lvl(int gaindXp)
        A method that handles player experience and leveling. Including maxLevel/Victory scenario.
        Parameters:
        gaindXp - The gaindXp should be the amount of xp any certain monster gives.
